 I'm a little confused. Your list of 100 records are actually singles. Records are albums. Also, no offence but if you list your own song...as the best...there is a little discreditation in there somewhere.
Every songwriter thinks his or her stuff is best. I just come out and admit it, that's the only difference.

Every songwriter thinks his or her stuff is best. 

 
 I totally disagree. IMHO, that type of arrogance is a rare exception. 
 
 Most songwriters and artists are more likely to give you a long list of other artists that they feel are far better than they are, artists that are both their contemporaries and their influences.
